channel.title: Final Courts on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Final Courts on 0x000216

item.title: The CJEU clarifies CILFIT regarding the final courts' obligations to refer questions.
item.description:
Daniel Sarmiento, Professor of EU Law at the University Complutense of Madrid* In a previous post, I argued that the European Court of Human Rights (ECtHR) held national supreme courts to a higher standard than the Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU) regarding preliminary references to the CJEU. I suggested this was due to the CJEU’s ruling in the CILFIT case. However, the CJEU has recently proven me wrong...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-cjeu-clarifies-cilfit-regarding-the-final-courts-obligations-to-refer-questions/
